#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t, i, carry, ans[1009], count;
	char str[1009];
	long long int k;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		scanf("%s", str);
		cin >> k;
		carry=0;
		count=0;
		for (i=strlen(str)-1; i>=0 && k; i--)
		{
			ans[count++]=(carry + (k&1)+(str[i]-'0'))%2;
			carry=(carry+(k&1)+(str[i]-'0'))/2;
			//cout << "In i: " << "k&1 = " << (k&1) << " str[i] = " << str[i]-'0' << " ans = " << ans[count-1] << endl;
			k=k>>1;
		}
		if (k)
		{
			while (k)
			{
				ans[count++]=(carry + (k&1))%2;
				carry=(carry+(k&1))/2;
				k=k>>1;
				//cout << "In k: " << ans[count] << endl;
			}
		}
		else if (i!=-1)
		{
			//cout << "else i = " << i << endl;
			for (; i>=0; i--)
			{
				ans[count++]=(carry + (str[i]-'0'))%2;
				carry=(carry + (str[i]-'0'))/2;
				//cout << "In else i: " << ans[count] << endl;
			}
		}
		if (carry) cout << carry;
		for (i=count-1; i>=0; i--)
		{
			cout << ans[i];
		}
		cout << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
